Text: thank you npto, this is a real nice piece to upload, and thanks to pbthal for the post and the amazing sound love the vinyl rips guys please keep them coming, someday you may see one of mine floating around i have good equipment i run all technics gear, with audio technica cartriges as my main setup but i have alot of old tube equipment passed on to me from my father (rip) but we both were heavily into good music got alot of my jazz and big band as well as the crooners from him lol im 44 now so ive enjoyed great vinyl for many years i def appreciate what you guys do and would support in any way im always looking for hard to find vinyl myself and definately support the cause...thank u guys again and god bless,  vintage_vinyl

im sorry i get long winded at times, i mean no offense by it, i just appreciate what you guys do...
vintage_vinyl
